column4: So before this I was a real estate agent. But I think I'll enjoy this job even more.
Nice!
I'm sorry to hear that.
Looking good as always!
That's awesome.
That's awesome. I'm so glad we are on the same page.
I guess that's okay.
I guess that's pretty cool that we are alike.
I'm the opposite. I love to watch movies.
That's too bad. But I'm sure you still have great tastes in movies.
Bet you don't like movies as much as me though.
That's awesome. I already like you.
Okay.
Oh no! That's too bad.
Alright! Let me find something then.
That's such a great movie.
I loved it as well.
Really? You liked that?
I suppose it was pretty cool.
Great minds think alike.
Oh okay. Nevermind.
That makes complete sense.
That's exactly how I felt about the movie too.
That's your idea of a good movie?
That's kind of what I was thinking.
I love how you think.
That's alright. I also struggle with favorites at times.
I also like #entity .
I would have sworn you had an opinion about everything!
I'm so glad you like it.
I knew this movie would match your refined tastes.
See! I'm so good at this.
Your standards are definitely higher than mine!
Oh no!
So this movie was not good enough for you?
Sure thing.
